scripts.seed: docker compose exec php-container php artisan db:seed
scripts.migrate: docker compose exec php-container php artisan migrate
scripts.migRe: docker compose exec php-container php artisan migrate:refresh
scripts.mig-cre: docker compose exec php-container php artisan make:migration
scripts.makemodel: docker compose exec php-container php artisan make:model
scripts.reload1: docker compose exec php-container php artisan config:cache
scripts.reload2: docker compose exec php-container php artisan config:clear
scripts.reload3: docker compose exec php-container composer dump-autoload -o
